about_the_game:
This is the original soundtrack for "Touhou Genso Wanderer -FORESIGHT-".

Tracklist

1: Tones of Memories (Original)

2: When the End Begins (Original: Unknown X ~ Unfound Adventure)

3: Hakurei Shrine Departure (Original: Touhou Yourendan)

4: Take the First Step (Original: Children's Festival ~ Innocent Treasures)

5: Hop Step Three Fairies (Original: Risking Life for Mischief)

6: Relaxing with You on the Veranda (Original: Shoujo Kisoukyoku ~ Dream Battle)

7: I'm a Genius (Original: Tomboy Love Girl)

8: A Glimpse of the Incident (Original: Magical Girls' Centenary Festival)

9: A Message of Trouble (Original: Oriental Dark Flight)

10: When Weakness Turns to Strength (Original: Flower City in the Sky)

11: Let's go! (Original: Eternal Shrine Maiden)

12: Do you want to play? (Original: "Red Chamber ~ Eastern Dream.../Sakura Sakura ~ Japanize Dream.../Eternal Dream ~ Mysterious Cedar Tree")

13: The beginning of solving the strange incident (Original: Spring-colored Path ~ Colorful Path)

14: A windy path through rice fields (Original: Konjaku Gensokyo ~ Flower Land)

15: A forest filled with monsters (Original: A soul as red as a ground cherries)

16: A village of humans with a charming atmosphere (Original: Japanese Saga)

17: Groping my way through the fog (Original: Runate Elf)

18: A tomboyish premonition (Original: Tomboy Love Girl)

19: 4000-Y H (Original: Shanghai Alice in the 17th Year of Meiji)

20: Beware the Thorns of Roses (Original: Shanghai Tea House ~ Chinese Tea)

21: Visiting the Red Mansion (Original: The Maid and the Bloody Pocket Watch)

22: Which do you prefer, reading or tea? (Original: Lacto Girl ~ Girl's Secret Room)

23: Library full of demons (Original: Wuwal Magic Library)

24: Searching for the master of the scarlet mansion (Original: Tepes's young descendant)

25: Girl dancing with a crimson spear (Original: Septette for the dead princess)

26: Peace of the crimson mist (Original: Dreams scarlet than red)

27: Traveling to awaken spring (Original: Muhayu no Sato ~ Deep Mountain)

28: Snowy scenery that takes your feet (Original: Crystalei Silver)

29: Frozen labyrinth of ice (Original: Tono Fantasy Story)

30: Until all the dolls decay (Original: Doll Trial ~ Girl who plays with human form) )

31: To the magical forest where magic gathers (Original: The Puppet Master of Bucharest)

32: Beyond the miasma and beyond (Original: Flower City in the Sky)

33: The performance will surely be above the clouds! (Original: Ghost Orchestra ~ Phantom Ensemble)

34: Enticed by the cherry blossom storm (Original: Touhou Youyoumu ~ Ancient Temple)

35: A serious battle to watch (Original: Hiroarisha Kaichoji ~ Till When?)

36: Searching for the master of the heavenly paradise (Original: Ultimate Truth)

37: Cherry blossoms dancing between life and death (Original: Bloom elegantly, ink-dyed cherry blossoms ~ Border of Life)

38: The warmth of a cold spring (Original: Youyoumu ~ Snow or Cherry Petal)

39: If I could eat your history (Original: Plain Asia)

40: The melody of a shining field (Original: Nostalgic Eastern Blood ~ Old World) )

41: Dense flower field (Original: Night of visions ~ Ghostly Eyes)

42: Nameless hill with lilies of the valley (Original: Night sparrow's song ~ Night Bird)

43: Endless bamboo forest of confusion (Original: Retribution for an eternal night ~ Imperishable Night.)

44: If we're rivals, let's play now (Original: Love-colored Master Spark)

45: Miniature garden full of rabbits (Original: Cinderella Cage ~ Kagome-Kagome)

46: Quiet miniature garden (Original: Cinderella Cage ~ Kagome-Kagome)

47: Crazy and wonderful LOVE IT (Original: Crazy eyes ~ Invisible Full Moon)

48: From the depths of the dark underground ( )

49: A small, malicious labyrinth (Original: Voyage 1969)

50: Moonlit diagnosis (Original: Millennium Gensokyo ~ History of the Moon)

51: Moonlit passage (Original: Touhou Yokai Komachi)

52: Searching for the owner of the eternal mansion (Original: Touhou Yokai Komachi)

53: Until it reaches the princess under the moonlight (Original: Bamboo Cutter Flight ~ Lunatic Princess)

54: The silence of the long night (Original: Eiyashou ~ Eastern Night)

55: Welcome to Kourindou! (Original: Curious Shanghai Old Pai)

56: What, what's this presence... a thief?! (Original: Curious Shanghai Ancient Pai)

57: Afternoon Study Time (Original: Satellite Cafe Terrace)

58: Can you defeat Saikyo? (Original: Tomboy Love Girl)

59: The time has come to devour everything! (Original: Memento of All Organisms ~ Memory of Fossil Energy.)

60: The indomitable parade of one hundred demons! (Original: Return to the Higan ~ Riverside View)

61: The parade of one hundred demons rampaging!? (Original: Saigetsu)

62: Aiming for the Mysterious Temple (Original: Suimusou)

63: Gazing at the Mysterious Temple (Original: Touhou Yourendan)

64: A Temple Wrapped in Serenity (Original: Demystify Feast)

65: A Temple Trapped in Illusion (Original: Onigashima in Fairyland)

66: From the Moment Hope is Lost (Original: The Mysterious Everyday Life of a Flying Shrine Maiden)

67: Vision of the Scarlet Mansion (Original: Septette for the Dead Princess)

68: Illusion of the Scarlet Mansion (Original: Magical Girls' Centenary Festival)

69: Dream of the Scarlet Mansion (Original: U.N. Owen is She? )

70: Vision of a Heavenly Paradise (Original: Blooming Elegantly, Ink-dyed Cherry Blossoms ~ Border of Life)

71: Illusion of a Heavenly Paradise (Original: Youkai Bakko)

72: Dream of a Heavenly Paradise (Original: Maiden Illusion Funeral ~ Necro-Fantasy)

73: Vision of an Eternal Mansion (Original: Bamboo Cutter Flight ~ Lunatic Princess)

74: Illusion of an Eternal Mansion (Original: Extend Ash ~ Horaijin)

75: Dream of an Eternal Mansion (Original: Reach the Moon, Smoke of Immortality)

76: Surely this is a different place (Original: Poison Body ~ Forsaken Doll)

77: Walking the path of certain death (Original: Fujin Shoujo)

78: Signpost of hope and despair (Original: Fate of Sixty Years)

79: Veiled Dreams (Original: Witching Dream)

80: The enshrined phantom (Original: Witching Dream)

81: True fantasy girl (Original: Shoujo Kisoukyoku)

82: Until greed consumes everything (Original: Memento of the greedy beast)

83: The last stride is narrow (Original: Into Backdoor)

84: The secret god and the door of purging (Original: The Hidden Four Seasons)

85: The phantom land seen from space (Original: Matara the Secret God ~ Hidden Star in All Seasons.)

86: Memento (original)

87: Strategic Retreat (original)

88: We've been defeated... (original)

89: Complete victory! (Original)

Theme song "Memento"

Vocal / Nami Nakagawa

Composition / Tatsuyuki Toyota (OSTVINTZ)

Lyrics / Yasuhiro Takaoki

Violin & Viola / MIZ

Guitar / Akira Yahagi

Cello / Masao Watanabe

Bass & Piano / Toyoda Tatsuyuki (OSTVINTZ)

BGM Production

Tatsuyuki Toyota (OSTVINTZ)： 1, 3, 4, 25, 37, 53, 55, 56, 60-89

Kojiro Maruyama / Kairis： 5-24, 26-36, 38-52, 54, 57-59

Violin & Viola / MIZ

Guitar / Akira Yahagi

Cello / Masao Watanabe

Bass & Piano / Tatsuyuki Toyota (OSTVINTZ)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is the product art book for "Touhou Genso Wanderer -FORESIGHT-".
